node.excerpt: A bug is a flaw or mistake in a computer program. Because JavaScript is quite loose, it often fails to catch typos when dealing with bindings and properties. JavaScript also allows silly computations without any warning, such as: Multiplying a boolean value by…

When devices communicate with each other on internet, such as through pictures, chat messages, etc, data is exchanged in the form of packets. A network packet is a piece of data that contains information about the message being sent, and the message itself…
